nodes.text: A Council visibly moving toward authorizing force is the last remote hope of getting Iraq to disarm peacefully
The only pacific means for Iraq to be disarmed are either Iraq's obedience to the orders or threat
That suggests he does not plan to carry out Mr. Blix's order to destroy missiles that exceed performance limits set by the U.N
Saddam Hussein reinforced that point himself yesterday by telling Dan Rather of CBS News that Iraqi missiles do not violate U.N. restrictions
If a person does not plan to carry out the orders he does not start doing what the orders command
